title: Riak Recap for September 14 - 15
description:
Posted on September 16, 2011

Afternoon Evening, Morning To All -

For today’s Recap: meetups, new production users, jobs, and more.

Enjoy and have a great weekend.

Mark

Riak Recap for September 14 – 15

  1. Riak 1.0.0pre4 is available for download.
    → Downloads and Release Notes here
  2. Jeff Kirkell is giving a Riak Talk at PhillyDB on Sept. 20. Thanks, Jeff!
    → Details here
  3. We added WorthPoint to the production users page on the wiki. (h/t to Mac Liaw for making this happen!)
    → Details here
  4. There’s a question on StackOverflow about link walking that (at time of writing) is still unanswered for anyone looking to get ambitious over the weekend.
    → Here
  5. Clint Shryock will be representing Riak at a NoSQL Smackdown happening on September 28 at the ComoRichWeb meetup in Columbia, MO. Thanks, Clint!
    → Details here
  6. Two great jobs to pass along:
    → BankSimple is looking for a Data Scientist in Portland, Oregon. Details here
    → CrowdFlower is hiring a Sr. Web Engineer in San Francisco with “Mongo, Riak, or Couch” experience. Details here
  7. Reminder about two great events happening on September 21:
    → Riak 1.0 Party in NYC (almost full, btw)
    → Riak 1.0 Overview with Andy Gross and Justin Sheehy
